T02TD2522E:130a-3: spyan dbye ba'i cho ga /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2522E:130a-4: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa //
T02TD2522E:130a-5: skad cig gis ni khyab mdzad pa //
T02TD2522E:130a-6: thugs rje cher ldan 'gro ba'i skyabs //
T02TD2522E:130a-8: slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan pa dang //
T02TD2522E:130a-9: bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med pas //
T02TD2522E:130a-10: lha yi gzugs la dmigs pa dang //
T02TD2522E:130a-11: ras ris la sogs bzlas shing bsgom //
T02TD2522E:130a-12: blo dang ldan pa gang zhig ni //
T02TD2522E:130a-13: bsod nams gzhan ni byed 'dod la //
T02TD2522E:130a-14: de ni rnal 'byor rgyud rnams kyi //
T02TD2522E:130a-15: rjes su mthun par 'di brjod bya //
T02TD2522E:130a-16: dang por khrus byas lus dris byugs //
T02TD2522E:130a-17: gtsang zhing dag pa'i gos gyon te //
T02TD2522E:130a-18: rgyu skar bzang po ldan pa la //
T02TD2522E:130a-19: mchod pa'i yo byad 'byor par bya //
T02TD2522E:130b-0: @130b gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs dang //
T02TD2522E:130b-1: bla re mchog ni bre bya zhing //
T02TD2522E:130b-2: bkra shis rnams kyis brgyan pa yi //
T02TD2522E:130b-3: bum pa gang ba gzhag par bya //
T02TD2522E:130b-4: pi wang gling bu rdza rnga sogs //
T02TD2522E:130b-5: glu gar dga' ston cher bya zhing /
T02TD2522E:130b-6: tsandan aa gar nag pos byugs //
T02TD2522E:130b-7: me tog sil ma bkram par bya ;
T02TD2522E:130b-9: nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i //
T02TD2522E:130b-10: ba yi lnga dang tsandan gyis //
T02TD2522E:130b-11: byug cing bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bsrung //
T02TD2522E:130b-12: ma spyad pa yi ras rnyed pa //
T02TD2522E:130b-13: spos kyi chu yis bkrus nas ni //
T02TD2522E:130b-14: rang gi lha sbyor bdag nyid du //
T02TD2522E:130b-15: der ni de rab gnas par bya //
T02TD2522E:130b-16: sngar ni cho ga rgyas byas la //
T02TD2522E:130b-17: spyan drangs mchod pa la sogs bya //
T02TD2522E:130b-18: brtson par byas nas de 'og tu //
T02TD2522E:130b-19: mtshan rnams rdzogs par ci bder ni //
T02TD2522E:130b-20: legs par bri ba'am bzo bo ni //
T02TD2522E:130b-21: nye bar 'ong ba 'dri ru gzhug / mkhas pas gshin rje gshed dam ni //
T02TD2522E:130b-22: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2522E:130b-23: ri mo'am sku gzugs gang yang rung //
T02TD2522E:130b-25: gnas de nyid du sngar bshad pa'i //
T02TD2522E:130b-26: khrus sa dag ni rab bshad de //
T02TD2522E:130b-27: zur bzhi pa la khru bzhi ba //
T02TD2522E:130b-28: bkra shis shin tu mdzes pa dag / dpangs su khru ni gnyis yod pa //
T02TD2522E:130b-30: de steng bstan pa'i rten bzhag pa //
T02TD2522E:130b-31: mkhas pas lha yi khrus gsol te //
T02TD2522E:130b-32: sems can kun la phan bde ba'i //
T02TD2522E:130b-33: sbyangs pa la sogs der bya'o //
T02TD2522E:130b-34: bkra shis rgyas par gyur pa dang //
T02TD2522E:130b-35: yang dang yang du bstod bya zhing //
T02TD2522E:130b-36: rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2522E:130b-37: ca co'i sgra ni gdon par bya ;
T02TD2522E:130b-38: / rgyal ba'i dbang bskur tshul du ni //
T02TD2522E:130b-39: gdugs dkar po yang gzugs par bya //
T02TD2522E:130b-40: bris gzugs glegs bam 'jim gzugs sogs //
T02TD2522E:130b-41: lha la cho ga shes pa yis //
T02TD2522E:130b-42: me long la ni gzugs brnyan bkru //
T02TD2522E:130b-43: lugs ma sku gzugs nyid ba'o //
T02TD2522E:130b-44: gsang sngags gang zhig khrus dang dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
T02TD2522E:130b-45: dzi na dzi ka la sogs pa rigs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o //
T02TD2522E:130b-46: de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i snying po de me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i til la sogs pa las kun rig gi snying po rig pa dang /
T02TD2522E:131a-0: ras ris bdag po'i gsang sngags @131a * //
T02TD2522E:131a-2: / bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pas //
T02TD2522E:131a-3: 'bru sman rin chen lnga rnams dang //
T02TD2522E:131a-4: tsandan dag gi chus bkang ste //
T02TD2522E:131a-5: mgul pa gos bzang dag gis bcings //
T02TD2522E:131a-6: lo ma bzang pos kha dgab bya //
T02TD2522E:131a-7: rig snying rigs kyi bdag po dang //
T02TD2522E:131a-8: rigs kyi las kun byed par bzlas //
T02TD2522E:131a-9: sku yi spyi gtsug dbu dang ni //
T02TD2522E:131a-10: phyag dang thugs kar byug par bya //
T02TD2522E:131a-11: de nas pus mo btsugs nas ni //
T02TD2522E:131a-12: bdug spos rnams kyis bdugs nas ni //
T02TD2522E:131a-13: mgon po gshegs shing bskul ba'i phyir //
T02TD2522E:131a-14: tshig ni 'di skad brjod par bya //
T02TD2522E:131a-16: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2522E:131a-17: bdag la brtse bar gyur nas ni //
T02TD2522E:131a-18: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD2522E:131a-19: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2522E:131a-20: thugs rje'i bdag nyid rab gnas pa //
T02TD2522E:131a-21: mgon po bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD2522E:131a-22: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la//
T02TD2522E:131a-23: da bas gnang bar mdzad par rigs //
T02TD2522E:131a-24: sangs rgyas mgon po brtser ldan dang //
T02TD2522E:131a-25: byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang //
T02TD2522E:131a-26: gang yang gsang ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD2522E:131a-27: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD2522E:131a-28: gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang //
T02TD2522E:131a-29: gang yang lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i//
T02TD2522E:131a-30: sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02TD2522E:131a-31: bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2522E:131a-32: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2522E:131a-33: yo byad ci 'byor ba yis ni //
T02TD2522E:131a-34: spyan dbye bar ni 'tshal lags na //
T02TD2522E:131a-35: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD2522E:131a-36: thugs ni brtse bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2522E:131a-37: chogs pa thams cad spyan 'byed pas //
T02TD2522E:131a-38: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2522E:131a-39: ras ris la sogs snying gar ni //
T02TD2522E:131a-40: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02TD2522E:131a-41: rang gi sa bon las byung mtshan //
T02TD2522E:131a-42: chos tshul gsang sngags dgod cing bsgom //
T02TD2522E:131a-43: sngags dang phyag mtshan gyur pa dang ;
T02TD2522E:131a-44: / spro zhing bsdu ba byas pa la //
T02TD2522E:131a-45: lha yi sku ni ji bzhin par //
T02TD2522E:131a-46: de las skyes par mkhas pas bsam //
T02TD2522E:131a-47: rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin //
T02TD2522E:131a-48: rang gi phyag rgya sku la sogs //
T02TD2522E:131a-49: byin brlab go rims bzhin du bya //
T02TD2522E:131a-50: de mdun ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2522E:131b-0: snga ma bzhin @131b yang legs bsgrubs na //
T02TD2522E:131b-1: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas //
T02TD2522E:131b-2: de dag dgug gzhug bcing ba dang //
T02TD2522E:131b-3: dbang bya rang gi phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2522E:131b-4: sgrub thabs las byung rim pas bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-5: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung ba dang //
T02TD2522E:131b-6: bgegs bsal la sogs chog bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-7: gdan 'bul la sogs byas nas kyang //
T02TD2522E:131b-8: dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-9: mdun du ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2522E:131b-10: sku yi lus la bcug nas ni //
T02TD2522E:131b-11: rang gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas //
T02TD2522E:131b-12: de nas mgon po 'dus pa bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-13: rdo rje dril bu'i sgra dbyangs dang //
T02TD2522E:131b-14: yid 'ong glu yis bstod par bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-15: snga ma bzhin du mchod yon sogs //
T02TD2522E:131b-16: dbul zhing bgegs bsal la sogs bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-17: gzugs brnyan gyi ni sku gzugs la //
T02TD2522E:131b-18: phyogs rnams kun nas lhag pa'i tshogs //
T02TD2522E:131b-19: mgon po dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2522E:131b-20: zhes brjod cing dgug par bya /
T02TD2522E:131b-21: rang gi phyag rgya byin brlab bcing //
T02TD2522E:131b-22: yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-23: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas //
T02TD2522E:131b-24: cho ga shes par byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2522E:131b-25: snga ma bzhin du gsol ba yang //
T02TD2522E:131b-26: de la dang por gsol btab nas //
T02TD2522E:131b-27: de yi phyag rgya go rims bzhin //
T02TD2522E:131b-28: dbang bskur ba ni bstan par bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-29: l'a sya la sogs rnams kyis mchod //
T02TD2522E:131b-30: dri sogs kyis kyang mchod par bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-31: gos dang rgyan dang so rtsi dang //
T02TD2522E:131b-32: gdu bu gtsug tor me long dang //
T02TD2522E:131b-33: gi wang dang ni li khri sogs //
T02TD2522E:131b-34: lha bshos rnams kyis rim bzhin mchod //
T02TD2522E:131b-35: de nas cho ga ldan pa yis //
T02TD2522E:131b-36: yid kyi mchod pas yang dag mchod //
T02TD2522E:131b-37: de yi sngags mang bzlas nas ni //
T02TD2522E:131b-38: phyi rol du ni gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD2522E:131b-39: zho dang 'bras chang yam shing dang //
T02TD2522E:131b-40: til 'bras mar dang bsres pa'i sa //
T02TD2522E:131b-41: bgegs rnams nye par zhi ba'i phyir //
T02TD2522E:131b-42: dang por bdud rtsi thab sbyor mchod //
T02TD2522E:131b-43: rang gi sngags rnams gang yin pas //
T02TD2522E:131b-44: mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-45: byed pa por 'gyur rig snying dang //
T02TD2522E:131b-46: rigs kyi rig pas zhi phyir dang //
T02TD2522E:131b-47: rigs kyi bdag pos byin rlob phyir //
T02TD2522E:131b-48: sreg blugs brgya dag so sor bya //
T02TD2522E:131b-49: de nas khrus bya lus gtsang ma'i //
T02TD2522E:131b-50: slob ma bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis //
T02TD2522E:131b-51: bzlas pa'i chu yis bsang gtor bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-0: g-yon gyi phyogs su gzhag par @132a * //
T02TD2522E:132a-2: / de yi lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02TD2522E:132a-3: lag g-yas mthe bong bzung nas ni //
T02TD2522E:132a-4: de nas mar gyis bkang ba yi //
T02TD2522E:132a-5: dgang gzar gyis ni bskor bar bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-6: rang gi lha yi sngags kyis ni //
T02TD2522E:132a-7: dgang blugs brgya ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-8: zho dang til dang bsres pa yis//
T02TD2522E:132a-9: de bzhin dgang blugs brgya byas na //
T02TD2522E:132a-11: tshe 'phel phyir ni d'ur ba dang //
T02TD2522E:132a-12: khyim rgyas phyir ni 'bras kyis bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-13: zho dang 'bras kyi sbyin sreg dbul //
T02TD2522E:132a-14: khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis //
T02TD2522E:132a-15: bzlas pa'i srung skud lag par gdags //
T02TD2522E:132a-16: gsang mthar zhi ba'i rig pa yis //
T02TD2522E:132a-17: de yi snying gar byug par bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-18: slob ma gus shing mgo btud nas //
T02TD2522E:132a-19: shes nas bla mas yon blang ngo //
T02TD2522E:132a-20: slob mas kyang ni gus pa yis //
T02TD2522E:132a-21: bla ma 'bad de mnyes byas te //
T02TD2522E:132a-22: slob dpon yongs su mnyes pa yis //
T02TD2522E:132a-24: de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2522E:132a-25: me la ji skad gsungs bzhin bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-26: mchod cing bskor ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2522E:132a-27: lha rnams la ni phyag byas nas //
T02TD2522E:132a-28: rang gnas song nas slob ma yis //
T02TD2522E:132a-30: de nas bla ma lha dang ni //
T02TD2522E:132a-31: sku yi gzugs brnyan brtan por bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-32: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02TD2522E:132a-33: go cha gyon pa'i tshul du bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-34: de nyid rdo rje bskor tshul gyis //
T02TD2522E:132a-35: steng dang 'og gi bar gyi cha'i //
T02TD2522E:132a-36: lus la lan gsum dkri bya zhing //
T02TD2522E:132a-37: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bzlas par bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-38: dar dbyangs bcing pa'i tshul las ni //
T02TD2522E:132a-39: rnam par bsgyings par mtha' nas dgrol //
T02TD2522E:132a-40: dar dpyangs tha ma bcings nas ni //
T02TD2522E:132a-41: rting pa bsams pas bstan par bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-42: de yi nyin par ci nus par //
T02TD2522E:132a-43: dga' ston rnams ni ci nus bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-44: glu dang gar dang rol mo dang //
T02TD2522E:132a-45: rnam par gnas pas gnas par bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-47: zhes yo byad lhag ma'i sngags rnams dang ;
T02TD2522E:132a-48: / phyag rgya dang rigs rjes mthun par //
T02TD2522E:132a-49: blo ldan rgyud la mkhas pa yi //
T02TD2522E:132a-50: slob dpon gyis ni sbyang bar bya //
T02TD2522E:132a-51: gang zhig rgyud 'di ma bsgoms pas //
T02TD2522E:132a-52: de nyid kun rdzob 'dod min te //
T02TD2522E:132a-53: de la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir //
T02TD2522E:132a-54: cho ga snga ma rjes su sbyar //
T02TD2522E:132b-0: lhag par gnas pa @132b thams cad ni //
T02TD2522E:132b-1: phyi dro'i dus su bya bar bshad //
T02TD2522E:132b-2: thugs rje'i bdag nyid nang par ni //
T02TD2522E:132b-3: spyan dbye ba ni bya'o zer //
T02TD2522E:132b-5: gshegs gsol bcas kun sngar bshad do //
T02TD2522E:132b-6: nang par yang ni sngar bshad pa'i //
T02TD2522E:132b-7: bya ba de nyid thams cad bya //
T02TD2522E:132b-8: cho ga de ltar bstan pa rnams //
T02TD2522E:132b-9: byas nas lha ni legs bzhag pa'i //
T02TD2522E:132b-10: dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa ni //
T02TD2522E:132b-11: rgyud rnams rgyal bas 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2522E:132b-13: rtag tu bdag gi bla mas bshad //
T02TD2522E:132b-14: thugs rje chen po rgyud kun du //
T02TD2522E:132b-15: cho ga 'di de bstan pa ni //
T02TD2522E:132b-16: slob mas go bar bya phyir gyis //
T02TD2522E:132b-17: rab gnas yi ge yongs ma yin //
T02TD2522E:132b-18: rang gi lus sam ras ris sogs //
T02TD2522E:132b-19: spyan drangs cho ga la sogs 'dis //
T02TD2522E:132b-20: sangs rgyas de yi rigs sogs dang //
T02TD2522E:132b-21: mngag gzhug la sogs gshegs mi gsol //
T02TD2522E:132b-22: srid pa'i mthar thug par du ni //
T02TD2522E:132b-23: de nyid rab tu gnas par bya //
T02TD2522E:132b-25: yang dag byang chub gnas par shog / bdag dang 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams //
T02TD2522E:132b-26: rdzogs byed 'jam dbyangs nyid gyur cig / spyan dbye ba'i cho ga slob dpon pra dzny'a ba li tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2522E:132b-29: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan pho dharma shr'i bha dra dang /
T02TD2522E:132b-30: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
